greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation to A135764.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of other permutations:
Other identities. For all n >= 0 the following holds:
a(A005408(n)) = A000124(n). [Maps odd numbers to central polygonal numbers].
a(A000079(n)) = A000217(n+1). [Maps powers of two to triangular numbers].
program: (PARI) a(n) = {r = 1; while(!(n%2), n = n >> 1; r++); k = 1 + n \ 2; binomial(r + k - 1, 2) + r} \\ _David A. Corneth_, Feb 05 2015
xref: Similar or related permutations: A209268, A246276, A246676, A249742, A249811.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 15 2014
